stockexchange.view

Interface IStockExchangeView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StockExchangeView

    public interface IStockExchangeView
    Interface for the StockExchangeModelView game view. An implementation will work with the IStockExchangeModelView interface to provide operations of FreeExchangeModelView.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayOptions()
      Displays the available options for users to select from to perform various operations on the stockExchangeModel.
      void errorMessage(java.lang.String errMsg)
      Displays the error message for users.
      void instructionMessage(java.lang.String instMsg)
      Dsiplays instruction message for the users.
      void operationSuccessful(java.lang.String succMsg)
      Displays message on successful completion of a particular operation.
